title: Hypothetical Learning Trajectory (HLT) Design Project for Elementary Geometry

context.prior_knowledge: Basic geometric shape recognition (line segments, circles, triangles, quadrilaterals, etc.) and spatial awareness
context.additional_context: Students perform culture-based geometry inquiry activities using personal devices in a BYOD environment, with continuous monitoring of the learning process through formative assessment

learning_goals: Students can explain components of three-dimensional shapes by connecting them to cultural examples (e.g., traditional architecture)
Students can apply the hypothesis-testing-revision cycle for geometric problem-solving with 80% or higher accuracy
Learners can revise their geometric concept maps three or more times based on peer feedback and formative assessment results
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
